name: RTCTrackEventInit.streams
description: The RTCTrackEventInit dictionary's optional streams property provides an array containing a MediaStream object for each of the streams associated with the event's track.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCTrackEventInit.streams' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
